PLAY A golfer has to train his swing on the practice tee, then trust the course. RELAX Reward yourself, relax & enjoy the experience at our spa. Membership Enquiry Golf Day Enquiry Facility Enquiry The Els Club The Els Club at Copperleaf is the second ‘Signature’ Ernie Els designed golf course in South Africa. 5 Membership Enquiry 5 Golf Day Enquiry This beautiful course has been designed to the highest possible specifications and USGA Specifications. The Els Club at Copperleaf is based just 40 minutes outside of Sandton or just 15 minutes outside of Centurion in Mnandi, Gauteng. Copperleaf is best defined as ‘modern classic’ – the layout tests every aspect of the game and provides even the longest hitters with a challenge. The course is one of the finest examples of the ‘Highveld grassland’ genre, and players experience a sense of openness and freedom with the Magaliesberg backdrop adding to the country atmosphere. Home to South Africa’s 1st Els Club Built on land once lived on by Ernie Els’ grandfather, Mr Ernie Vermaak. Care & Dedication Evident Everywhere Flyovers See each course’s video Modern & Minimalistic A five-start experience Visit Ernie Els Website The Golf Shop Professional Service & Advice The Golf Shop Visit our Golf Shop to indulge in a variety of golfing necessities and chat to one of our qualified PGA Professionals to make the most of your golfing experience. From custom putter fitments to the latest golfing gadget, you will find what you need to best suit your game, with us. We look forward to welcoming you to this 5-star golfing experience. Contact Us Opening Hours Mon | Closed Tue – Sun | 6:00 – 18:00 Golf Times | 7:00 – 18:00 Terms & Conditions Fees are for individuals only and group bookings Fees include VAT Fees include green fees, warm up balls on range prior to tee off and golf cart hire (1/2 cart) – Carts are compulsory. Cart trail fee is applicable per round, if you use your own cart. Only battery operated carts We are not open for golf on Mondays (Public Holidays excluded) Sunday mornings are for members only.  Email Us enquiries@copper-leaf.co.za  Address Ernie Els Boulevard, Mnandi, Centurion  Call Us +27 12 668 8900 Contact Us Name Email Address Contact Number Message Send Home to South Africa’s 1st Els Club Live. Website designed by Par Six Golf Media Manage Consent To provide the best experiences, we use technologies like cookies to store and/or access device information. Consenting to these technologies will allow us to process data such as browsing behavior or unique IDs on this site. Not consenting or withdrawing consent, may adversely affect certain features and functions. Functional Functional Always active The technical storage or access is strictly necessary for the legitimate purpose of enabling the use of a specific service explicitly requested by the subscriber or user, or for the sole purpose of carrying out the transmission of a communication over an electronic communications network. Preferences Preferences The technical storage or access is necessary for the legitimate purpose of storing preferences that are not requested by the subscriber or user. Statistics Statistics The technical storage or access that is used exclusively for statistical purposes. The technical storage or access that is used exclusively for anonymous statistical purposes. Without a subpoena, voluntary compliance on the part of your Internet Service Provider, or additional records from a third party, information stored or retrieved for this purpose alone cannot usually be used to identify you. Marketing Marketing The technical storage or access is required to create user profiles to send advertising, or to track the user on a website or across several websites for similar marketing purposes. Our team will be available daily from dawn to dusk to assist with your reservation. Thank you for your patience and understanding! Membership Enquiry Golf Day Enquiry Facility Enquiry Welcome to Copperleaf Situated in the heart of Gauteng, Copperleaf is positioned at the edge of the city, but still feels like it’s a million miles away from the hustle and bustle of urban life. The three words we live by at Copperleaf are… 5 Live 5 Play 5 Relax …and we ensure that our residents and members live by the same. Live Exceptional family lifestyle in a secure environment. Secure The lifestyle you’ve always dreamt of Beautiful All our surroundings are a pleasure Community Orientated An environment for all Learn More Play A golf course designed by Ernie Els. Book A Round Of Golf Quick & easy Membership Preferential bookings all year Learn More The Golf Shop Local & International brands Relax Spa Treatment Menu & Pricelist Relaxation for the body Learn More Monthly Promotions Have a look at great value Exceptional family lifestyle in a secure environment. Hole19 is the leading golf app for tracking scores, navigating courses with GPS precision, and unlocking performance insights. 4.4 Copperleaf Golf Club Bonita Springs, FL, United States This course is mapped and available on Hole19 App Play 18 holes at Copperleaf Golf Club in Estero, FL. Championship course, practice facilities, clubhouse, tournaments & leagues await you! Description Copperleaf Golf Club in Estero, Florida, offers an exceptional 18-hole championship course perfect for golfers of all skill levels. Located in the heart of Southwest Florida, this beautifully maintained course features lush fairways, challenging water hazards, and strategic bunkers that provide a test to your game while showcasing the natural beauty of the region. Copperleaf is more than just a golf course—it’s a vibrant community with year-round tournaments, league play, and special events hosted by the Copperleaf Ladies and Men’s Golf Associations. 

Practice your swing at the comprehensive practice facilities, including a driving range and putting greens. After your round, relax in the elegant clubhouse, which boasts a pro shop stocked with top golf merchandise, dining options, and a welcoming atmosphere. Whether you're a local resident or visiting Estero, Copperleaf Golf Club guarantees a memorable golf experience with top-tier customer service and a vibrant, community-focused environment. Copperleaf Golf Club Home Private Clubs Real Estate Golf Certified Agent Directory Golf Homes For Sale Lifestyle Golf Resorts Travel Golf Products More Contact Golf Life Navigators News & Insights Start Here! ✕ Welcome to Copperleaf Golf Club Estero, Florida Contact Copperleaf Golf Club For More Information About The Club Membership Golf Amenities Real Estate Contact & Location About The Club Welcome to Copperleaf Golf Club Experience a sense of belonging, a place to develop friendships and unwind in the beautiful serenity of Copperleaf. Experience Copperleaf’s Year-Round Activities Copperleaf’s many shimmering lakes and abundant natural preserves provide spectacular accents to the Audubon-certified 18-hole championship golf course that winds through the community. Neighborhoods overlook the emerald fairways, picturesque greens and vibrant lakes of the golf course. Whether You Live Here or Play Here, You’re Home Copperleaf is a premier bundled golf community of 416 single family homes and 154 carriage homes of distinction. One and two story homes feature architectural designs that capture Southwest Florida’s fabulous outdoors. Membership Membership at Copperleaf Golf Club Copperleaf is a private, bundled, member owned community. We offer a select amount of Associate and Social Memberships. Associate Membership All Associate members will enjoy the same amenities as resident members. These amenities include participation in ALL golf events, summer reciprocal program at numerous pristine golf clubs, fitness center with new equipment, and SO much more! Click Here to view Associate Membership Packet Social Membership All Social members will enjoy the same amenities as resident members, with the exception of Golf. These amenities include participation in summer reciprocal dining program, fitness center with new equipment, and SO much more! Click Here to view Social Membership Packet Golf Golf at Copperleaf Golf Club It is the goal of the Copperleaf Professional Golf team to provide the highest level of customer service. From the golf shop through the last putt on the 18th hole, fun tournaments, exceptional instruction, and an attractive, interesting golf merchandise concession. Copperleaf holds numerous tournaments throughout the year. During the winter season, the Copperleaf Ladies Golf Association has league play one day each week, with additional special events throughout the season. Copperleaf Ladies 9 Association (CL9) has league play once a week and several special events during season. CL( provides opportunities to golf 9 holes for those who no longer want to play 18 holes. There are also many opportunities for men to enjoy organized competition through the Copperleaf Men’s Golf Association. There are numerous couples’ events, including weekly, informal Sunday couple play, club-organized couple events and a Couples Member Guest. The “Grand Finale” to each season is the 3 day Member Classic in which upwards of 180 members participate. The inclusive attitude of Copperleaf members is evidenced by the number of golf groups organized by members that play throughout the week. They are welcoming, easy to join and a great way to form friendships that invariably extend beyond the course. Golfers ride the course in style in the latest golf cart model from EZ-GO. Helpful technology is at each member’s disposal during their golf round, making it a snap to find their yardage through the GPS system on the golf cart. The Golf Operations staff leads a comprehensive instructional program for all ability levels. Leading the program are Copperleaf’s PGA Class A professional, Jason Miller. Weekly clinics are held throughout the winter season, as well as special programs and a two-day golf school. They enjoy helping members “sharpen” their game. The Copperleaf Golf Shop is stocked with the finest quality apparel and equipment, typically at lower prices that the golf retail shops in the area. Copperleaf is a Gordon Lewis designed championship golf course and redesigned by Kipp Schulties. Amenities Amenities at Copperleaf Golf Club Every day, residents are seen taking advantage of the beautiful grounds and safe neighborhoods of Copperleaf in healthy and enjoyable exercise pursuits beyond the golf course, tennis and bocce courts and the community pool. Copperleaf Boulevard forms a 1.7 mile loop around the community. The Copperleaf Loop, residential neighborhoods and golf course environment provide pleasant settings for outdoor exercising or taking a nice slow stroll with a loved one or friend, often meeting and greeting neighbors and other friends along the way. A sidewalk around the loop enables members to enjoy a comfortable, leisurely stroll, an invigorating walk or jog, or they can bike ride and roller blade in the low traffic streets. Some residents add all the neighborhood streets, which extends their exercise to 7 miles. Dogs can be seen regularly walking with their owners along the loop, each enjoying the exercise and each other’s companionship in Copperleaf’s nature paradise. Dining Ospreys The Leaf Fitness The Activity Center provides members with spectacular views of the outdoor recreation area, lake and golf course. It houses an exercise room with state-of-the-art equipment and an activity room for exercise classes It also provides members with restrooms, lockers and showers. Copperleaf hosts year-round fitness classes for members and guests. Classes are ever changing and custom to participants. A Certified Personal Trainer is available for member’s needs. Bocce Copperleaf has first class, lighted Bocce courts with shaded areas. The recessed courts with Har-Tru surfaces have convenient access to the Ospreys. Bocce provides an opportunity for fun, skill building and a chance to meet new people and form friendships. A popular activity at Copperleaf, approximately 450 men and women participate in once a week league matches on Monday through Thursday in January through March. The season concludes with championship playoffs. The league is as much a social experience as it is an athletic competition. After the weekly matches, many players enjoy dinner and beverages continuing the enjoyable experience of camaraderie with friends and neighbors. Tennis If you love tennis, Copperleaf is the right place for you! Copperleaf offers four Har-Tru courts that are fenced in, have windscreens and are illuminated for night play. A covered viewing area with high top tables and stools offer spectators a comfortable place to watch tennis matches. The tennis program at Copperleaf is enhanced by the services of a tennis pro who organizes clinics and lessons. Programs are available for those new to tennis, or who have played in the past and want to refresh their skills or play at an advanced level. Men’s, women’s and mixed leagues offer many opportunities for organized play. The tennis courts are located in close proximity to the Activity Center, Pool Area, restroom facilities and Ospreys (outdoor dining facility). It provides the perfect setting for players to enjoy socializing and relaxing after a tennis match. Swimming Facilities An entry kiosk opens into the spacious recreation and swimming pool area. The generous decking around the pool provides a place for entertainment, dancing, and a place to lounge or enjoy sitting by the fire pit. The pool is geothermally heated for a leisurely swim, water aerobics or lap swimming. A beautiful deck, an inviting pool, always ready hot tub, soft seating groupings where friends can enjoy conversation, covered seating, bar, and outdoor dining creates a Copperleaf resort-like experience. Real Estate Real Estate at Copperleaf Golf Club Copperleaf is a premier bundled golf community of 416 single family homes and 154 carriage homes of distinction. One and two story homes feature architectural designs that capture Southwest Florida’s fabulous outdoors. Bundled golf provides Copperleaf homeowners with membership in the Copperleaf Golf Club, which includes all of the Club amenities, with no golf initiation cost. Copperleaf is located in the Brooks Community, near the Coconut Point Mall, Lee Health Medical Center, the Miromar Outlets Mall and numerous restaurants and shopping opportunities in Estero and neighboring Fort Myers and Naples. Along with the 27,000 square foot clubhouse, members enjoy facilities that include tennis and bocce courts, a geothermally heated swimming pool and spa, and a 1.7 mile walking and biking loop. In addition, members also enjoy gathering at Ospreys (outdoor dining facility) and working out at the Activity Center. Contact & Location Contact Anna Laabs To Learn More! Latest Places New Real Estate Favorite Cypress Woods Golf & Country Club New Dining Favorite Cafe Marquise New Real Estate Favorite Royal Palm Coast Realtors Association New Shopping Favorite Caloosahatchee Cannabis Company New Professional Directory Favorite Stilwell Enterprises & Restaurant Group View all Real Estate Briefs By Staff on December 26, 2024 Copperleaf Golf Club celebrates opening of clubhouse renovation Copperleaf Golf Club in Estero celebrated the grand opening of its upscale and completely renovated $20 million clubhouse, which features 28,000 square feet of dining and entertainment options for its members. This is the final step and crowning achievement of total revitalizing the 23-year-old clubhouse and pool complex after its initial groundbreaking in June 2023. David Dore-Smith, general manager and COO of Copperleaf at The Brooks, welcomed several hundred members, vendors and the construction team to the grand opening event with a champagne celebration recently, introducing guests to all areas of the state-of-the-art clubhouse and its facilities. “Copperleaf has always been admired for its golf course,” shared Dore-Smith. “Additionally, we now have first-class dining and entertainment options for club and associate members that are elevating our club with best-in-class features to serve our members for decades to come.” Loren Wegman of Wegman Design was responsible for the interiors of the entire clubhouse and its custom lighting. Gordon Knapp, owner’s project manager and president of Knapp Construction Management, shared, “Everyone on the team pulled together as they battled the challenges, and the project stayed on track. Sincere congratulations are extended to Chris Curran and his team at Curran Young Construction for weathering many storms and delivering a fantastic, finished product.” Executive Chef Justin Hornyak, who recently completed his first year at Copperleaf, toured club members in his shining three-section kitchen, which will be staffed by two sous chefs and 18 cooks when the club is at full capacity. A Pennsylvania Culinary Arts Institute graduate, Hornyak has been a professional chef for over two decades and loves cooking a wide variety of customer favorites. A seasoned hospitality professional, Carmine Spiro is Copperleaf ’s Food & Beverage director. With a staff of over 30 servers, Spiro is a strong proponent of hospitality training. His immediate goal is to bring exceptional service to club members. “With our expanded dining and entertainment facilities, we have decided to open our venues to non-members wishing an elegant location for weddings and other special events during May-October,” Spiro said. Built by Pulte Homes in 2000, Copperleaf Golf Club is a gated 460-acre master planned development featuring 570 single-family and carriage homes. The Naples and Estero Chambers came together to celebrate the grand opening of Corsa at Estero Crossing, STOCK Luxury Apartment Living’s newest community. COURTESY PHOTO STOCK’s Corsa at Estero Crossing hosts grand opening Corsa at Estero Crossing, a new pet-friendly, luxury rental community by STOCK Luxury Apartment Living, a division of STOCK Development, celebrated its grand opening earlier this month, marking an exciting addition to the growing Estero area. Located just west of I-75 on the south side of Corkscrew Road, Corsa is nestled within Estero Crossing, a mixed-use community designed to combine residential, retail, office and dining spaces. Estero Crossing is thoughtfully designed, with retail shops, offices and restaurants situated on its northern side and luxury apartments on its southern side. Each is connected by beautifully landscaped walkways and roads. The project provides residents a unique blend of convenience and elegance, enhancing the area’s appeal for those seeking a vibrant lifestyle. “Corsa at Estero Crossing is an answer to the growing need for luxury apartment living in the Estero market,” said Claudine Leger-Wetzel, vice president of sales and marketing for Stock Development. “Corsa’s spacious residences and resort-style amenities are a few of the many reasons why residents have rushed to sign a lease at Corsa.” In fact, Corsa is reporting that the community is over 95% leased and is approaching total occupancy as residents prepare to move into their new homes following the grand opening. The gated rental community of Corsa at Estero Crossing features luxury apartments in six three-story buildings with elevators. One, two and three-bedroom apartments are available offering a variety of views. Inside the apartment homes, residents enjoy 9-foot, 4-inch ceilings, wood-style floors, spacious walk-in closets, including custom closets in select units; balconies and patios; high-speed fiber internet with fiber-optic technology; ceiling fans, smart home technology and USB charging ports. The kitchens include energy-efficient, stainless-steel appliances with flat-top ranges, side-by-side refrigerators, oversized islands with hardwood modern cabinetry, top-of-the-line plumbing fixtures, walk-in showers, quartz countertops and under-mount sinks. Corsa’s two-story, 21,364-square-foot clubhouse is the centerpiece of the community. Amenities include a resort-style pool with a sun shelf, an expansive sun deck, private cabanas, grill stations, a large covered veranda with table games for social gatherings and an indoor-outdoor bar area. Inside the clubhouse, amenities include a sports lounge, golf simulator and media room, individual workspaces, a convenient mini-market and vending center and even two full-size bowling lanes. The pet-friendly community also features an indoor pet spa, a dog park with agility equipment, and a car care center for the residents’ convenience. Additional onsite amenities include a greenspace with walking path and pocket park, a package management center with refrigerated food package storage, electric car charging stations and a satellite barbeque pavilion overlooking a lake. To learn more, visit CorsaEstero.com . ¦ Leave a Reply Cancel reply Your email address will not be published. Copperleaf Golf & Country Estate | LinkedIn Skip to main content LinkedIn Top Content People Learning Jobs Games Sign in Join now Copperleaf Golf & Country Estate Recreational Facilities Follow View all 15 employees Report this company About us Copperleaf  Golf & Country Estate is a breath-taking new concept in Exceptional Family Living. Situated in the heart of Gauteng, Copperleaf is positioned at the edge of the city – and yet feels like a million miles away from the bustle of urban life.

Exceptional Family Living at Copperleaf

Copperleaf boasts a secure and tranquil country setting just 40 minutes from Sandton or 15 minutes from Centurion and is based in Mnandi, Gauteng. Our carefully planned mix of golf estate property and homes, South Africa’s first Els Club (an Ernie Els designed golf course) and leisure facilities are all designed to create an environment we call Exceptional Family Living.

We invite you to come and experience all we have to offer, and with stands priced from just R775,000 and you could be part of something quite exceptional.

Copperleaf Golf Club - Naples Golf Homes | Naples Golf Guy Property Search Golf Communities Naples Bonita Springs / Estero Fort Myers Greater Sarasota Bundled Equity Luxury Buyers Sellers Discover SWFL FAQ’s Dinning & Entertainment Shopping Beaches Calendar of Events Golf Accommodations Healthcare Arts & Attractions About Us Naples Golf Guy Team Downing Frye Realty Contact Us Testimonials Blog Property Search Golf Communities Naples Bonita Springs / Estero Fort Myers Greater Sarasota Bundled Equity Luxury Buyers Sellers Discover SWFL FAQ’s Dinning & Entertainment Shopping Beaches Calendar of Events Golf Accommodations Healthcare Arts & Attractions About Us Naples Golf Guy Team Downing Frye Realty Contact Us Testimonials Blog 239.370.0892 info@naplesgolfguy.com Back to Bonita Springs / Estero Golf Communities Copperleaf at the Brooks Copperleaf Golf Club is a low-density private club resort within the Brooks gated community, developed by the award-winning Bonita Bay Group. Golf membership assures priority tee times on the manicured fairways and picturesque greens of an 18 hole championship course created by course architect Gordon G. Lewis. In addition to golf, residents have access to a fitness center and spa, resort-style pool and bocce ball courts. They also have the option to join the Commons Club which offers additional amenities. Wide, generous fairways present options and challenges for all levels of players. Copperleaf Golf Club is a bundled golf community located in Bonita Springs and Estero, Florida with 570 bundled units. Copperleaf is located within 5 minutes of shopping, dinning and the beautiful beaches of the Gulf of Mexico. And, it’s just 12 miles from Southwest Florida International Airport (RSW). Bottom Line The Naples Golf Guy Team specializes in helping buyers and sellers with their real estate needs in Southwest Florida Golf Communities. Contact us today for more information. Additionally, there are annual recurring fees associated with the property, as well as one-time fees due at the time of purchase.
